identity.mission: Create a 'Creative Studio' aesthetic that feels like a physical workspace for digital artists. Reject generic SaaS templates. Embrace 'Vibrant Play' mixed with 'Swiss Clarity'.
principles: Fusion: Mix productivity tools with art gallery aesthetics.
Emotion: Every interaction should feel 'snappy' and 'optimistic'.
Content is King: The video thumbnails are the heroes; the UI is the frame.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to create focus, not just to fill space.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and feature callouts. Don't be afraid of large sizes (text-4xl+).

body.usage: Use for all UI text, descriptions, and data tables. High legibility is key.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=Outfit:wght@400;600;700;800&display=swap');

primary.name: Electric Azure
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key brand moments.

background.name: Studio White
background.usage: Main app background. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF for the full page background.

rules: Containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

grid_system.marketing: Mode A: The Tetris Grid (Asymmetrical, Artful). Use col-span-full for heroes, col-span-4 for features.
grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: High Density Grid (Functional). Use col-span-1 for stats, col-span-2/3 for charts.

containers.card_style: rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-blue-500/20 hover:shadow-blue-500/40 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-6 font-medium bg-white border border-neutral-200 text-neutral-700 hover:bg-neutral-50 hover:border-neutral-300 transition-all
buttons.ghost: rounded-full px-4 py-2 font-medium text-neutral-600 hover:text-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-50

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-neutral-100 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] hover:shadow-[0_8px_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.08)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: rounded-xl border-neutral-200 bg-neutral-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all h-12 px-4

login_hero.alt: Happy creator working in a bright studio

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default). For feature sections, use colorful background circles behind icons.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette and font families. 2. Update index.css to import fonts and set the new base styles. 3. Refactor the Dashboard to use the 'High Density Grid'. 4. Redesign the Login page using the 'Split Screen' layout with the provided hero image. 5. Ensure all cards use the new 'Soft Utility' shadow styles.
